startUrls.title: Website URLs to Audit
startUrls.description: List of website URLs you want to analyze for UI/UX quality

useFreeMode.title: Use Free Tier
useFreeMode.description: Enable this to use the free tier (5 audits per day). Disable to use your own API key for unlimited audits.

apiKey.title: Your API Key (Optional)
apiKey.description: Provide your own OpenAI (sk-...) or Google Gemini (AIza...) API key for unlimited audits. Leave empty to use free tier.

analysisType.title: Analysis Type
analysisType.description: Choose the type of UI/UX analysis you want to perform
enumTitles: Accessibility - WCAG compliance and inclusive design
Conversion - CRO and sales funnel optimization
Performance - Visual performance and load indicators
SEO - On-page SEO elements and content structure
Mobile-First - Mobile UX and responsive design
Brand Consistency - Color palette and typography

viewPort.title: Viewport / Device Type
viewPort.description: Simulate desktop or mobile device for screenshot capture

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy to avoid blocking and access geo-restricted content

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of pages to analyze simultaneously (recommended: 3-5 to avoid API rate limits)
